name: Stalwart Guardian
description:
The cooldown of 

<spec>Arms</spec>
<dynamic>Die by the Sword</dynamic>

<spec>Fury</spec>
<dynamic>Enraged Regeneration</dynamic>

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>Shield Wall</dynamic>

 is reduced by <dynamic>20 sec</dynamic>.

name: Brutal Vitality
description: <dynamic>6.0%</dynamic> of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.

name: Inspiring Presence
description: Rallying Cry's duration and health granted are increased by <dynamic>20%</dynamic>.

name: Safeguard
description: Intervene reduces damage taken by the target by <dynamic>10%</dynamic>.

name: Iron Maiden
description:
<spec>Arms</spec><spec>Fury</spec>
<dynamic>Slam</dynamic>

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>Revenge</dynamic>

 has a <dynamic>4.0%</dynamic> chance to refund a charge of Shield Block.

name: Ashen Juggernaut
description: Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by 3% for 8 sec, stacking up to <dynamic>6</dynamic> times.

name: Crash the Ramparts
description: Overpower has a <dynamic>6.0%</dynamic> chance to apply Colossus Smash for 3 sec.

name: Cacophonous Roar
description: Intimidating Shout can withstand <dynamic>80%</dynamic> more damage before breaking.

name: Merciless Bonegrinder
description:
Slam critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of 

<condition>Ravager</condition>
<dynamic>Ravager</dynamic>

Bladestorm by <dynamic>1.0 sec</dynamic>.

name: Indelible Victory
description:
<condition>Impending Victory</condition>
<dynamic>Impending Victory</dynamic>

Victory Rush heals you for <dynamic>400%</dynamic> of the damage it dealt over 8 sec.

name: Unnerving Focus
description: Last Stand increases your Rage generation by <dynamic>30%.</dynamic>

name: Hack and Slash
description: Rampage has a <dynamic>10.0%</dynamic> chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.

name: Vicious Contempt
description: Bloodthirst deals <dynamic>40%</dynamic> increased damage to enemies who are below 20% health.

name: Piercing Verdict
description: Spear of Bastion's instant damage and Rage generation are increased by <dynamic>20%</dynamic>.

name: Veteran's Repute
description: Brandishing the Conqueror's Banner immediately grants you 5 Glory, and while the banner is planted your Strength is increased by <dynamic>12%</dynamic>.

name: Harrowing Punishment
description: Condemn's damage dealt and prevented are increased by <dynamic>8%</dynamic> for each nearby enemy, up to <dynamic>40%</dynamic>.

name: Mortal Combo
description: Mortal Strike has a <dynamic>15%</dynamic> chance to hit an additional time.
